title: Border, 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needlework on knotted net
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Border for a tablecloth in net darned with a pattern of angular scrolling vine with foliage and blossoms pointing alternately up and down. Two ends have double design placed back to back.
